patterns.description: Fake Interac e-Transfer notification with a deposit link — real auto-deposits need no action.
Claims an Interac e-Transfer from the CRA — the CRA never sends e-Transfers.
Unexpected Interac deposit supposedly from a bank — used as a lure to click a phishing link.

patterns.pattern: your Interac e-Transfer has (expired|failed).*click here to re-claim
patterns.description: Claims your e-Transfer expired and needs to be reclaimed via a link.
